frameDefinitions: A Trajector is identified as occurring at the same time as some better-known Landmark.
A stretch of linguistic discourse or a Text that a Communicator produces has a Topic that it is about.
A Dependent state-of-affairs has a Requirement as a prerequisite for obtaining or occurring.
In this frame, an Agent engages in personal body care by grooming either a Patient or a Body_part.
The speaker believes that some state of affairs or entity (the Requirement) must be present in order to cause some other dependent state of affairs to occur (the Dependent).
The answer to a Question is under discussion in a Group, which still  has a difference of opinion among its members.
frameExamples: He tried to take care of that <t>on</t> his last visit .
The atomic bombings were probably not <t>necessary</t> to win WWII without a mainland invasion of Japan.
Firstly, it is quite clear the <t>issue</t> in this context was not so much apostasy as much as it was treason.
listRoleDefinitions: The entity that occurs at some time.
The event which designates the time at which a trajector occurs.
The period that occurs with respect to some other time.
The period in which a trajector takes place.  This period can be cyclical and, in that case, is interpreted contextually.
The event that occurs at some time.
The entity which designates the time of some trajector.  Note: this role is infrequent or non-existent in English and is included for completeness.
The <fen>Topic</fen> is what a <fen>Text</fen> is about.
A set of propositions that is coherent in being about a <fen>Topic</fen>
The <fen>Communicator</fen> is the person who has produced a <fen>Text</fen> on a <fen>Topic</fen>.
The time at which the <fen>Communicator</fen> produces <fen>Text</fen> on a <fen>Topic</fen>.
The state-of-affairs which cannot hold without the <fen>Requirement</fen>.
The entity or state-of-affairs that must be present or obtain in order for the <fen>Dependent</fen> to obtain.
An entity that has to be present for the <fen>Dependent</fen> state of affairs to obtain.
The time at which the <fen>Requirement</fen> is necessary for the <fen>Dependent</fen>.
<fen>Place</fen> denotes a location in which the specified relation between <fen>Requirement</fen> and <fen>Dependent</fen> holds.
The agent is the person who does the grooming.
The patient is the person who gets washed.
This is the region of the body that gets groomed.
This role identifies the time when the event occurs.
Where the event takes place.
The Cognizer requires or believes he/she requires the Requirement to hold so that the Dependent will occur.
The entity or state-of-affairs that must be present or obtain in order for the Dependent to obtain.
The state-of-affairs which cannot hold without the <fen>Requirement</fen>.
An undesirable state-of-affairs that results if the <fen>Requirement</fen> is not met.
The <fen>Time</fen> at which the <fen>Cognizer</fen> requires the <fen>Requirement</fen>.
The location of the <fen>Cognizer</fen> when he/she requires the <fen>Requirement</fen>.
The <fen>Question</fen> is an open proposition the answer to which is under dispute.
The time interval during which the <fen>Question</fen> exists as a problem for the <fen>Group</fen>.
listRoleExamples: The current <fex>President of Georgia</fex> was born in Tbilisi.
During <fex>last night's walk</fex> , I stubbed my toe.
Future <fex>eras</fex> will be vastly changed from today.
I went to the store on <fex>Tuesday</fex>.
Currently, <fex>researchers are making new discoveries very quickly.</fex>
In his book, <fex>Smithers</fex> discusses cotton production.
<fex>In the US</fex>, the political clout of big city mayors is necessary to put this on the national agenda.
He needs to focus on his schoolwork, <fex>or he's not going to pass the third grade</fex>.
<fex>Over at Merv's house</fex> they need three more cement trucks to finish the job.
The issue is <fex>who will have control of Iraq's rich oil resources</fex>.

The issue <fex>at the time</fex> was whether or not to relocate the Rennes-based part of
the team to California.
